title: Stacey Solomon taps into relaxation mode with sons Zachary, Leighton and Rex on Maldives trip
text:
She recently returned to the Loose Women panel from maternity leave, just four months after she welcomed her third son.

But Stacey Solomon has kicked her feet up as she and her children Zachary, 11, Leighton, 7, and Rex, 5 months, enjoyed a luxury getaway to the Maldives.

In snaps posted to her Instagram account on Tuesday, the TV host, 30, displayed her impressive post-baby figure in a white bandeau bikini as she soaked up the sun with her kids.

In her element: Stacey Solomon has kicked her feet up as she and her children Zachary, 11, Leighton, 7, and Rex, 5 months, enjoyed a luxury getaway to the Maldives

Looking every inch the beach babe, the I'm A Celeb star radiated confidence in her two-piece, which she paired with a netted kaftan.

The brunette appeared in great spirits as she doted on her baby in a separate image, which she captioned: 'He loves looking at himself in the mirror... Wish this was my actual bathroom.'

As the group arrived on the Asian island, the mother-of-three kissed her son Rex - who she shares with beau Joe Swash - as she revealed he slept through the night.

The media personality penned alongside the picture: 'He slept all night. I honestly pooped myself when I tapped my phone and it said 8am! I don't mind if it's a fluke because of jet lag, I'll take it... so b****y grateful right now'.

In her element: In snaps posted to her Instagram account on Tuesday, the TV host, 30, displayed her impressive post-baby figure in a white bandeau bikini (pictured with Rex)

'Beach time': Looking every inch the beach babe, the I'm A Celeb star radiated confidence in her two-piece

Look at her glow: The brunette cut a stylish figure as she paired her scanty swimwear piece with a netted kaftan

How sweet: Stacey appeared in great spirits as she doted on her baby in a separate image, captioned: 'He loves looking at himself in the mirror... Wish this was my actual bathroom'

Stacey offered a glimpse of Rex's dressing preparations the following day, before sharing an image of cheeky Leighton cooling off in an orange towel following their kayaking trip.

Living in the lap of luxury during their trip, the family treated themselves to a refreshing stroll along the sandy shores of the holiday hotspot.

During her relaxing holiday, the X Factor star shared the realities of motherhood as she washed Rex's bottles in the sink.

Stacey's getaway comes after she admitted her parents were left 'disappointed' when they found out she was pregnant at 17.

Happy mummy: As the group arrived on the Asian island, the mother-of-three kissed her son Rex - who she shares with beau Joe Swash - as she revealed he slept through the night

Her little boys: Stacey offered a glimpse of Rex's dressing preparations (L) before sharing a picture of cheeky Leighton cooling off in an orange towel following their kayaking trip (R)

'Early evening beach walks': The family treated themselves to a refreshing stroll along the sandy shores of the holiday hotspot

'Sunsets with my favourite humans': Stacey and her kids tapped into full relaxation mode along the beach

The TV star delved into her past struggles on Loose Women earlier this month, where she revealed her 'upset' parents gave her no input on whether she should keep the baby or not.

Confessing she felt sick upon learning she was pregnant with her son Zachary, the musician explained she was left in 'absolute turmoil' because all she wanted was for her 'mum and dad to tell her what to do.'

Stacey - who recalled her pregnancy struggle during a segment called Life Before Loose - revealed she found out she was pregnant while she was still in college.

The presenter explained: 'I remember being in a cafe and sitting with my dad and my step mum and I was literally gagging. I didn't think anything of it, I just thought someone must have had extra strong onions somewhere.

Having fun: The Celebrity Juice star's eldest sons enjoyed a boogie in the swimming pool to Regard's Ride It

'Everywhere I goooo I always take the steriliser with me': During her relaxing trip, the X Factor star shared the realities of motherhood as she washed Rex's bottles

'When we got home that night my step mum took me upstairs and handed me a pregnancy test. The thought that my parents knew I'd had sex made me die!

'I always remember my parents wouldn't give me any input whatsoever. Even though they were really upset with me, and hurt and disappointed, they never told me whether I should go ahead and have the baby or not have the baby.

'Which at the time was absolute turmoil because all I wanted was for my mum and dad to tell me what to do.

'I just felt like I couldn't make such a big decision on my own, I really needed them. But looking back, in hindsight, it was the best thing they could have ever done because I made that decision on my own and I took responsibility for it.'
description: The TV host, 30, kicked her feet up as she and her children Zachary, 11, Leighton, 7, and Rex, 5 months, enjoyed a luxury getaway to the Maldives.
